alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 10:03PM EDT until April 05 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A mix of snow, freezing rain, sleet, and rain are expected Tuesday night. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations up to a quarter inch possible. East winds gusting as high as 60 mph. Highest winds and ice accumulations expected along the Keweenaw Spine. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM Tuesday to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
